text: The Evenks (Evenki: EwenkÄ«) are an ethnic group native to Northern Asia. Most of them are living in Russia (Siberia) or China (Inner Mongolia). Small number of them also live in Mongolia and Ukraine. Evenks are a Tungusic people. They are related to the Manchu and the Oroqen. == Related pages == * Tungusic languages == References == Category:Ethnic groups in China
title: Evenks
